programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: First, Daniel has almost a dozen children with ten different women. While he admits to being their father, he refuses to care and provide for most of them. Then, Tadrianna strips and has sex for money and her mother, Kim, can't convince her to stop.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Hope I'm Not The Father
programme.desc: Lorie gave birth to twin boys, and while she initially thought boyfriend Carlos was the father, she would later believe it was actually Warren, a claim he strongly denies. Warren wants Lorie to stop harassing him about being the father.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Angelica says John "checks her" for signs of cheating every time she comes home. She wants a lie detector test to prove she's been faithful! Then, Ashley she found out that her boyfriend, TJ, had cheated on her when she was 8 months pregnant.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Jessica can't make sense of her on again off again relationship with Wade and it's starting to drive her crazy. Wade however claims he's had nothing to do with Jessica and she's been spreading lies and stalking him for years.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Katrina believes her sister Kendra’s boyfriend is a cheater and having sex with her best friend Nay-Nay! Later, John previously faced abuse allegations and has returned with a shocking update!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: TJ refuses to let Ashley see their child after a video of her blowing marijuana smoke into the baby’s face. Then, Tiffany blames Shawn for their 10 year old daughter’s smoking and wandering the streets. Can Steve intervene before it’s too late?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Did Marcus’s ex’s boyfriend Charles molest their son? Ex Jamaica is torn between kicking out Charles for the meanwhile and wondering if Marcus’s girlfriend Tonya is lying to gain custody of the boy. What will Charles’s lie detector test say?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Bobbie says that her daughter Cindy’s home was filled with so many dangerous animals that she was forced to report her to child protective services because she felt her grandchild was in danger. But Cindy says Bobbie has another agenda!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Kaliegh is 23 and is a heroin addict. Her mother, best friend and ex-boyfriend who got her hooked on heroin in the first place, are here to beg her to go to rehab. Follow her as she travels to the rehab clinic and tries to get clean!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: A teenage boy abuses his mom, often getting his younger brother involved. He says that he got the idea when he'd witnessed one of his mother's boyfriends pull a knife on her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve I'm 14, I Need Your Help
programme.desc: 14 year old Rusty called our show because he says that he can no longer deal with his parent's constant fighting. He says that in the past they've hit each other, thrown appliances at each other and even bit him. His mother Mildred says that she and her husband Russell always fight and abuse each other because she suspects Russell of cheating.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Erica kicked her boyfriend Martez out of their house and out of her life. But she’s willing to give him a second chance if he proves that he didn’t molest her 4 year old son! Then, Christy’s ex Stephen refuses to admit that he fathered her son!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Stephanie’s drug addiction led her to severely neglect and abuse their children. As Scott’s fiancée Amy has stepped in as a mother and Stephanie fails multiple drug tests, he doesn’t want her near the children, but wants her to atone for her wrongs!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Curtis sat down with his mother Telisha, and told her that he is trying to have a baby but Telisha was shocked and terrified because Curtis is only 13 years old! Curtis insists he is ready to be a father.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Did You Leave My Kids to Die?
programme.desc: Russell wants to put his family back together after his 3 children died in a fire. Next, Tatiana believes her 2-year old nephew was abused. And she's accusing her sister's ex-fiance Chris. Chris says he's not an abuser.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You're Not the Father, I Borrowed a Baby
programme.desc: Noah and Kendra had a yearlong fling, but when he finally visited her, she had a baby and claimed he was the father! Marvin and Rainy have been married for almost 6 years, but two weeks ago, she received a call saying that Marvin had cheated on her!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: A Father's Fight for His Daughter
programme.desc: Robert believes his daughter is being abused and molested by her stepfather, John, but John and Tiffany denies any abuse. Is Tiffany covering for John’s abuse? See the shocking lie detector test today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Elaina and her husband Lennard claim their daughter was raped by her brother-in-law Lenel. Lenel’s fiancée and Elaina’s sister, Elissa, believes they’re making up this entire story. Don’t miss the shocking results today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: How Can You Still Love Him?
programme.desc: Joyia is desperate to keep her friend Stephanie from going back to her abusive boyfriend Scott. If Stephanie takes him back, Scott will continue to abuse her. But she still loves him! Will she have the strength to leave him?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Nathan currently has 4 children with 2 different women and is in a serious mountain of trouble. Jamie, his first baby's mother, is tired of his lasting neglect for their 3 kids and needs him to step up to the role.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Tacarra has been with Jaray for 5 years and raising two children together. But now she feels the passion has died and his coldness towards her has driven her crazy, and now she questions her marriage, and Jaray's honesty.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Brandie is a 16 year old sex addict who claims to have slept with over 200 men. Steve enlists the help of Marvelyn, a woman who contracted HIV at the age of 19. Then, Shantaysia is 19 years old and works as a prostitute.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Korey is positive that his girlfriend Dominique is cheating on him and is also worried that she might be a prostitute. She says that his suspicions have caused him to become abusive. Then, Gregory thinks that his girlfriend Robin isn’t faithful!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: He Makes Me Have Sex With His Friends
programme.desc: Ashley believes her husband Michael may have molested their 3 year old son. Michael says she is making up this entire story so she can divorce him. Next, Anjail believes Dwight has been physically abusing their son.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Beat Them Up, What If They Pass?
programme.desc: Hannah is tired of Nick's crazy accusations, hacking into her computer and texting her friends pretending to be her. Then, Nicole says she's never cheated on her husband Robert. She also claims that the constant accusations caused her to miscarry.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Have Proof, You're Abusing Our Child
programme.desc: Robert says he believes that his daughters mother has been abusing her and he wants to prove the abuse and gain full custody of his daughter. Then, Casey claims her ex-boyfriend is abusive towards their kids and she wants him out of their lives.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 6 Kids Taken Away, but I Want More
programme.desc: Danielle’s children were taken out of her care after cops observed all 4 children, including her newborn, home alone. Her fifth and sixth babies were taken from her care, too. But she wants to prove that she could be a good mom!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Tonya is here to stop her 14-year-old daughter Talia from ruining her life before she’s an adult. She doesn’t approve of her boyfriend Jerry who needs to get out of her daughter’s life because he’s responsible for everything that’s wrong with her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Why Are You Dating A Child?
programme.desc: Sheila fears that her teen grand-daughter is having sex with a 26-year old family-friend. Then, Jaquella started dating her boyfriend Shaquille when he was a teen. Shaquille's mother is here to confront Jaquella for sleeping with her child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: The laziest husband and wife lie about their child in order to get support from a woman who believes the child is her grandchild.
